definitions.definition: A piece of excavating equipment , either an integral subassembly or an attachment , consisting of a digging bucket or scoop on the end of an articulated arm , drawn backwards to move earth ; used in excavator / digger and backhoe tractors.
A multi-purpose tractor with a front-mounted loading bucket and a rear-mounted digging bucket. The tractor combines a front-end loader / loader (component) and an excavator / digger (component).

main_definition: A piece of excavating equipment , either an integral subassembly or an attachment , consisting of a digging bucket or scoop on the end of an articulated arm , drawn backwards to move earth ; used in excavator / digger and backhoe tractors.
secondary_definitions: ( chiefly US , Canada , Australia ) A multi-purpose tractor with a front-mounted loading bucket and a rear-mounted digging bucket. The tractor combines a front-end loader / loader (component) and an excavator / digger (component).
